/** * ElementNSImpl inherits from ElementImpl and adds namespace support. *

* The qualified name is the node name, and we store localName which is also * used in all queries. On the other hand we recompute the prefix when * necessary. * * @xerces.internal * * @author Elena litani, IBM * @author Neeraj Bajaj, Sun Microsystems * @version $Id: ElementNSImpl.java,v 1.48 2005/05/10 15:36:42 ankitp Exp $ */
